summary: Adds 5 new craftable weapons: Death: The Dagger, Hell: The Dagger, Death: The Sword, Hell: The Sword,  and The White Horsemans Blade
descriptionHtml:
Adds 5 new craftable weapons: 

Death: The Dagger
Daedric Dagger, does 12 damage + 7 absorb Health

Hell: The Dagger
Daedric Dagger, does 0 damage, 20 Absorb Stamina, Paralyze for 1 sec, Soul Trap for 5 sec

Death: The Sword
Daedric Sword , does 15 damage + 7 absorb Health

Hell: The Sword
Daedric Sword, does 0 damage, 20 Absorb Stamina, Paralyze for 1 sec, Soul Trap for 5 sec

The White Horsemans Blade 
Silver Sword, does 18 damage, 7 absorb health, Paralyze for 1 sec, Soul Trap for 5 Sec, Absorb 20 stamina. Swing time is slower than most 2-handers though.
author: TheHighpander
